#Text=Yu says : " Take your stances !
#Text=If you pay for the whole year in advance , I 'll bump you up to the next belt !
#Text=" Aang says : " Ehhh , he 's not the one .
#Text=" Male student says : " I think The Boulder 's going to win back the belt at Earth Rumble VI .
#Text=" Male student # 2 says : " He 's going to have to fight his way through the best earthbenders in the world to get a shot at the champ .
#Text=" Aang says : " Excuse me , but where is this earthbending tournament , exactly ?
#Text=" Male student says : " It 's on the island of Noneya ... " Noneya " business !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh , I got to remember that one !
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'll take care of this .
#Text=Hey , strong guys !
#Text=Wait up !
#Text=" Sokka says : " What was I thinking ?
#Text=I do n't need a new bag !
#Text=Why did you let me buy this ?
#Text=" Katara says : " You ready to find an earthbending teacher ?
#Text=Because we 're going to Earth Rumble VI !
#Text=" Aang says : " How 'd you get them to tell you ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Oh ... a girl has her ways .
#Text="
